snippet: Gov. Johnston will oeturn to Harrisburgh to-morrow, visit Carlisle on Saturday, and be in Philadelphia on the night of that day, and will probably address several meetings here on Monday. He has worked hard to render an account of his steward ship...

byline.original: Correspondence of The New York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: Gov. Johnston will oeturn to Harrisburgh to-morrow, visit Carlisle on Saturday, and be in Philadelphia on the night of that day, and will probably address several meetings here on Monday. He has worked hard to render an account of his steward ship before the people, and I think he has done the cause much good. Politics in our city do not ferment quite as much as they did.
